instructions_to_main_agent: 2. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to 'index.css' at the very top.
3. TAILWIND: Update 'tailwind.config.js' to include the 'royal' and 'gold' colors defined above. Extend the font family to include 'Syne' and 'Manrope'.
4. LAYOUT: Use the 'Bento Grid' strategy for the Services section. Make the Solar service the largest tile (col-span-2 row-span-2).
5. SNIPCART: Add the Snipcart script to 'public/index.html' (use a placeholder API key if not provided). Ensure the 'snipcart-checkout' class is on the cart button.
6. POPUP: Create a 'CustomerCaptureModal' component that triggers after 5 seconds. Use a glassmorphism style.
7. FORMS: Use Shadcn UI forms but style them with the 'inputs.default' styles defined above. No white backgrounds for inputs.
8. IMAGES: Use the provided Pexels URLs. Do not use placeholders.
9. NAVIGATION: Create a sticky glassmorphism header. Logo on left (Text: Jonesaica), Nav links center, 'Get Quote' Gold button right.
10. FOOTER: Massive footer with 'Jonesaica' in huge Syne font (text-9xl) at the bottom, with links above it.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
